features: Quickly converts a standard bottle of water for child use
body.description: Product Description Going out is simple and easy with the Spout Adapter because it quickly changes a standard bottle of water into a sippy cup. The drip-free spout is made from silicone and encourages healthy oral development. Its small size saves space and provides a back up to the everyday sippy cup. From the Manufacturer BPA free! Stop carrying around multiple baby bottles while traveling. Simply turn a regular water bottle into a toddler bottle! Adapter fits most disposable water bottles. Polypropylene with silicone nipple.

Spout Adapter for Water Bottle Quickly converts a standard bottle of water for child use Going out is simple and easy with the Spout Adapter because it fits on a standard bottle of water that you can buy anywhere. The combo silicone sippy and straw spout encourages healthy oral development and its small size saves space and provides a back up to the everyday sippy cup. Bestseller! Combo sippy & straw spout Collar fits 2 standard bottle sizes Travel cap keeps spout clean Materials: Polypropylene; Silicone

Combo sippy and straw spout Promotes healthy oral development as baby transitions from breast- or bottle-feeding to independent drinking. Collar is threaded for two standard sizes Option 1: Pull spout through collar. Twist adapter onto standard water bottle. If it does not fit, pull spout out and turn over for option two. Option 2: Pull spout through opposite side of collar and screw on bottle. Space-saving solution Fits most U.S. manufactured disposable water bottles and comes with travel cap to keep spout clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think anyone would be happy with this item!
reviews.reviewText: Very convenient to use with a thirsty toddler on the go! Does not work on great value water bottles. Not enough threads for the sprout adapter to fit properly. It does fit other brand name bottles. So far I'm really liking the convenience of this product and it's easy to clean and toss into your purse or cars console/ glove box! I actually bought two so that I could have one and my grandchilds parents could have one also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy for your little one.
reviews.reviewText: Very useful for a little one especially on the go. If your baby is drinking from a sippy cup then they will most likely be able to drink from this just fine. It attaches to most brands of water bottles, but it will not fit the Great Value (Walmart brand) bottles. The Spouts are smaller on that particular brand. Otherwise, It seems to fit most of the other brands. Also It is leak proof and easy to clean. Hope this Helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019
reviews.reviewText: So I was really excited to try these out for my second child since I knew that we would be hitting up several birthday parties this summer and they always have those mini bottles of water, which a toddler under 2 cannot really drink from yet (at least my boys can’t). I even purchased the 3 packs to be able to get them shipped. I even remembered to bring them to the party and low and behold they had the mini water bottles. So I got the spout out and somewhat smugly screwed on the spout and handed it to my 17 month old. Nope. First of all, it leaked from the seal. I didn’t realize that you need some threads to be able to seal the spout onto the water bottle correctly. So I tried to get that plastic ring off of the water bottle to get it screwed down more tightly. Mission impossible. But then secondly, the hole in the end of the spout is designed in such a way that you can’t even get water sucked through it!? What’s the point of that!? I tried to even cut the hole bigger with a scissors and it didn’t even matter!? All the water was spilling from the bottom of the spout and nothing coming out of the actual tip. Ugh. So perhaps with a different water bottle and perhaps if I cut the entire tip off the spout, this may work. And I will try that eventually at the next birthday party. But it did not work when I needed it. Love the concept, but needs some major tweaks! Don’t waste your money - just bring your kids’ actual water bottles to the party.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thus it wasn't nearly as useful during travel as I'd hoped
reviews.reviewText: For whatever reason, my 17-month-old daughter prefers drinking from an Aquafina bottle with this attached over anything else. It doesn't leak, and it's a very handy idea. 2 main problems: first, it doesn't fit the tops of Coca-Cola brand bottles, which includes Dasani, which is the bottled water you're most likely to find on the road. Thus it wasn't nearly as useful during travel as I'd hoped. Second, the cap isn't really adequate - it doesn't have any way of staying attached, so it got lost on the airplane on our most recent trip. It also doesn't keep the inside of the cap clean, so you have to store it in a plastic bag if you're traveling with it. Overall, a good concept, but just not as useful as it could be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful as back-up sippy cup
reviews.reviewText: (New edits added to "COMPATIBLE" section below.)Sometimes I forget to pack the baby's one and only sippy cup.This 3-piece water bottle cap adapter works well, but yes, I agree that it doesn't have a vent so as the baby drinks from the water bottle through this adapter, the plastic walls of the bottle collapse. Every 4-5 sips, I take the bottle away from the baby, unscrew the adapter, let the air fill up the bottle again, and then hand the whole thing back to the baby. Small inconvenience, but an inconvenience nonetheless. Thus, 4 stars.That drawback aside, there are plenty of benefits:1. COVER EXISTS! It DOES have a clear cap that snaps over the spout! (At least, mine does! I did wonder why previous customers didn't get their caps...)2. PORTABLE! It's small enough to keep in a pocket, purse, pacifier bag... even a Gladware 1/2-cup mini round storage container (the kind you can find at a supermarket or Amazon, 8 units per pack [...]). Yes, a sandwich bag will also do in a pinch.3. EASY TO CLEAN! Each piece -- silicone spout, green "neck" and clear cap -- are extremely easy to handwash using the smaller nipple brush attachments that most people have. If water's the only thing that you use it for, there's less of a worry about scrubbing off juice bits.4. COMPATIBLE! For Poland Spring bottles, the adapter works if the green "neck" is screwed with the logo upside down. Although the directions do say this clearly, I'd say it here too: If the adapter doesn't work with the particular water bottle you have, try re-inserting the spout through the green neck but in the opposite direction so that the logo on the green neck appears upside down. The green "neck" is threaded on both ends, expanding its compatibility with a range of water bottles.EDIT Oct. 2011: Compatible with the Platypus Platy Soft Bottle with Closure Cap. This product combo has proven to be a very convenient way to carry baby's drinking water.5. CHEWABLE! My baby likes chewing thoughtfully on the silicone spout between sips. No damage yet, to baby or bottle cap adapter. But I'm sure Green Sprouts will warn against treating this adapter as a toy. It's not a toy, okay?6. NO LEAKS! If the adapter is screwed on correctly for the water bottle you have (and assuming the two are compatible), turning the water bottle upside down does not create a shower. If anything, it's hard to get liquid out... see drawback above.

Perfecto para darle de tomar a un menor que aún no sabe usar bien botellas o vasos. Su boquilla con dos medidas lo hace ajustable a cualquier tipo de botella. Excelente opción para cuando estás fuera de casa.
Fits great on a bottle of water, easy to change sizes if needed. I leave it in my bag for on the go use. Just a good handy product.

reviews.reviewTitle: works wonderfully. Only complaint is that it needed a small ...
reviews.reviewText: works wonderfully. Only complaint is that it needed a small hole in order for my granddaughter to actually get any water out of it. Other than that works perfectly and doesn't leak when thrown or dropped.

Needed something to throw in my purse for when I have those mom moments and forget to bring a specific cup for baby, I can give him any water bottle using this! If it doesn’t fit the bottle take the nipple off and put it in facing the other way and it fits more bottles! Definitely buy it!
Lo compré con mucho entusiasmo y al principio no lo usé correctamente por lo que tuvo fuga, le di la vuelta al adaptador y funcionó correctamente!!! Estoy muy muy contenta
